quiz.title: Relationship Personality Quiz
quiz.subtitle: Discover Your Relationship Style
quiz.description: Take our comprehensive quiz to understand your relationship personality and get personalized advice for building stronger connections.
quiz.question: Question

payment.title: Complete Your Purchase
payment.description: Secure payment to unlock your personalized relationship insights
payment.success: Payment successful! Your results are being prepared...
payment.save_success: Your quiz results have been saved successfully!
payment.save_warning: Payment successful, but there was an issue saving your results. Please contact support if needed.

questions.q1: How do you typically handle conflicts in relationships?
questions.q1_option_1: I prefer to address issues immediately and directly.
questions.q1_option_2: I need time to process before discussing the problem.
questions.q1_option_3: I try to find a compromise that works for everyone.
questions.q1_option_4: I sometimes avoid confrontation to keep the peace.
questions.q2: What's most important to you in a relationship?
questions.q3: How do you express affection to your partner?
questions.q3_option_2: By giving gifts or doing thoughtful acts of service.
questions.q3_option_3: With words of affirmation and compliments.
questions.q4: When making important decisions with a partner, you prefer to:
questions.q4_option_1: Take the lead and make decisions confidently.
questions.q4_option_2: Discuss all options thoroughly before deciding together.
questions.q4_option_4: Be flexible and go with the flow.
questions.q5: How do you react when you feel emotionally hurt by someone close to you?
questions.q5_option_1: Express my feelings immediately and directly.
questions.q5_option_2: Withdraw and process my emotions privately.
questions.q5_option_3: Try to understand their perspective before reacting.
questions.q5_option_4: Tend to forgive quickly and move forward.

communicator.title: The Communicator
communicator.description: You value open and honest communication in relationships. You're direct about your needs and feelings, which helps prevent misunderstandings.
communicator.personality_advice_1: Practice active listening to balance your directness with empathy.
communicator.personality_advice_2: Remember that not everyone processes emotions as quickly as you do.
communicator.personality_advice_3: Your honesty is a gift, but timing and delivery matter.
communicator.personality_advice_4: Create safe spaces for others to share their thoughts without judgment.
communicator.personality_advice_5: Use your communication skills to build bridges, not walls.
communicator.relationship_advice_1: Ask open-ended questions to encourage deeper conversations.
communicator.relationship_advice_2: Practice patience when others need time to articulate their feelings.
communicator.relationship_advice_3: Look for partners who appreciate your directness and can match your communication style.
communicator.relationship_advice_4: Balance talking with listening in your relationships.
communicator.relationship_advice_5: Use 'I' statements to express your needs without making others defensive.

harmonizer.title: The Harmonizer
harmonizer.description: You excel at creating balance and peace in relationships. Your ability to see multiple perspectives makes you a natural mediator and supportive partner.
harmonizer.personality_advice_1: Don't sacrifice your own needs for the sake of keeping peace.
harmonizer.personality_advice_2: Practice expressing your preferences, even when they might create minor conflict.
harmonizer.personality_advice_3: Your empathy is a strength, but remember to set healthy boundaries.
harmonizer.personality_advice_4: Trust that healthy relationships can handle some disagreement.
harmonizer.personality_advice_5: Value your peacemaking abilities while honoring your authentic self.
harmonizer.relationship_advice_1: Communicate your needs clearly, even if it feels uncomfortable at first.
harmonizer.relationship_advice_2: Practice saying 'no' when requests don't align with your values or capacity.
harmonizer.relationship_advice_3: Look for partners who value compromise as much as you do.
harmonizer.relationship_advice_4: Address small issues before they become major problems.
harmonizer.relationship_advice_5: Celebrate the strength in your adaptability and peacemaking skills.

independent.title: The Independent
independent.description: You value autonomy and personal growth in relationships. You bring a strong sense of self and clear boundaries to your connections.
independent.personality_advice_1: Balance independence with vulnerability for deeper connections.
independent.personality_advice_2: Share your internal process with trusted others.
independent.personality_advice_3: Recognize when self-reliance becomes a barrier to intimacy.
independent.personality_advice_4: Practice asking for help when needed.
independent.personality_advice_5: Your self-sufficiency is a strength that brings stability to relationships.
independent.relationship_advice_1: Communicate your need for space proactively, not reactively.
independent.relationship_advice_2: Create rituals of connection to balance your independence.
independent.relationship_advice_3: Look for partners who respect your autonomy without feeling threatened.
independent.relationship_advice_5: Share your growth journey with those closest to you.

loyalist.title: The Loyalist
loyalist.description: You prioritize trust and commitment in relationships. Your reliability and dedication create a secure foundation for deep connections.
loyalist.personality_advice_1: Ensure your loyalty to others doesn't override loyalty to yourself.
loyalist.personality_advice_2: Recognize that trust can be rebuilt after small breaches.
loyalist.personality_advice_3: Balance consistency with spontaneity and growth.
loyalist.personality_advice_4: Allow yourself and others room to evolve and change.
loyalist.personality_advice_5: Your steadfastness provides valuable security in relationships.
loyalist.relationship_advice_1: Communicate your expectations clearly to avoid disappointment.
loyalist.relationship_advice_3: Look for partners who value commitment as much as you do.
loyalist.relationship_advice_4: Build trust through small, consistent actions over time.
loyalist.relationship_advice_5: Create space for both security and adventure in your relationships.

errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.validation: Please fill in all required fields.
errors.payment: Payment processing failed. Please try again.
